Perceptor::

"Sneaking as usual, eh, Swichblade??"said sarcastically Perceptor "is 
it a custom that you have or are you planning somthing?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Switchblade / Megatron --
> 
> Unoticed to Inferno and Quickstrike as they enter the Predacon 
> control room, Switchblade was still in cyber bug form, connected to 
> the base surveilance system. He'd been listening to the 
> conversations in the base entrance.
> 
> To avoid suspicion, he quickly disconnects himself, and transforms 
> into robot mode, quickly expanding as the rest of his body comes 
out 
> of subspace. Not bothering to say anything, he simply observes 
> Flicker and Pheonix intently, checking out their weaponry, and 
> defensive abilities based on what he could analyse with his visions.
> 
> ----------------------------
> 
> Megatron enters the control room moments later behind Flicker, 
> Pheonix, and the other Preds. He immediately goes over to the 
> control chair, and sits down. His fingers click on a a keypad 
> situated on side of the chair's arm. A disply appears above the 
> holopad about a metre and a half in front of him.
> 
> The display showed a diagram of the explored portions of the world 
> so far, and Megatron wanted to know whether Wolfenstein, Flicker, 
> Pheonix, or Skulletron had anything to add to the map. He turned 
his 
> attentions to Flicker, instead of the diagram.
> 
> "Flicker, you had a plan. So, put it into the computer, and do tell 
> about it. Leave no details out." Megatron smiles a smile which 
> expressed his intrest in what Flicker had proposed. "Oh, and don't 
> waste too much time, I have other matters to deal with, like 
> planning the assault on the Tripreds for their insolent attack on 
> our base. Those fools will not go unpunished."
> 
> Without looking as Switchblade, his eyes narrow, "Switchblade... I 
> see you've found your way out of the CR chamber."
> 
> "Yah, something like that Megs..." Switchblade nearly yawns, 
> expressing his apparent boredom. "I wonder if the Tripreds have one 
> of those artifact piec--" He cuts off, leaving Megatron and the 
> others to fill in the thought.
> 
> The possibility that the Tripreds had one of the pieces of artifact 
> was strongly possibe... something that would have to be looked 
into. 
> Megatron considers it, then his mind shifts back to the present 
> situation.
> 
> Megatron waits for Flicker, signaling for the other Preds to let 
him 
> talk.
